Timerepublik.description: I'm currently in charge of the design and the user interface of the application. From the idea to the wireframes to the code. I developed it as 'mobile first', using a responsive approach and paying a lot of attention to performance, loading time and usability.

Fitmo.description: I was in charge of all the front-end of the application, I made all the decisions regarding the technologies to use and I also contributed to design process. I also interviewed candidates for front-end positions.
